DESCRIPTIONS: Add #yPhase to all drawn cards for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:EclipsedFormPower.NAME: Eclipsed Form

${modID}:SystemErrorPower.NAME: System Error
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d time%s a card #yPhases, draw 2 cards.

${modID}:ManipulationPower.NAME: Manipulation
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase attack damage and #yBlock gained from #yPhased cards by #b%d.

${modID}:LoseManipulationPower.NAME: Manipulation Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b%d #yManipulation.

${modID}:TeslaCoilPower.NAME: Tesla Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yPlasmic #yEnerg%s+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:HadalJetsuitPower.NAME: Hadal Jetsuit
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yPhase a card, gain #b%d temporary #yManipulation. NL Every 3 cards #yPhased, gain #b%d Manipulation.

${modID}:O5CommandPower.NAME: O5 Command
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot draw cards for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:OrbitalStrikePower.NAME: Orbital Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies when all #yOrbital #yBeacons are played.

${modID}:OwnTempoPower.NAME: Own Tempo
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d #yExperiment%s played twice.

${modID}:PhaseNextCardPower.NAME: Phase Next Card
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPhase a copy of the next #b%d card%s you play.

${modID}:BorealisProtocolPower.NAME: Borealis Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yPhase all non-Power cards with #yPhase #b%d time%s.

${modID}:IonSurgePower.NAME: Ion Surge
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 times you #yProgress an #yExperiment, gain #b%d #yStrength, #yDexterity, or #yArtifact randomly. NL ( [REMOVE_SPACE]#b%d Progression%s left.)

${modID}:BlackBoxPower.NAME: Black Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yPhase a card, gain #b%s #yMetallicize. NL At the start of your turn, lose half of your #yMetallicize.

${modID}:InstabilityPower.NAME: Instability
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have #b3 #yInstability, lose all stacks of #yInstability and end your turn.
